summary: Consists of a player home, merchants; most of which are followers, NPC homes, guards and craftable enchanted arrows.
descriptionHtml:
[center][b][color=#ffffff][/color][/b][/center][center][color=#ffffff]Hi ...[/color]
[b]West Riding Retreat is an [u][color=#00ffff]update[/color][/u] to my previous version [color=#00ffff][u]Amaranthine[/u][/color].[/b]
[b]I changed the name along with many other things.[/b]
[b]If you have Amaranthine Installed, please [/b][b][color=#00ffff][u]remove it[/u][/color][/b][b] before installing this version, sorry for the inconvenience.[/b]
[b]I hope you enjoy this one.[/b]
[b]Ok enough said, I am of for a holiday see you guys in a month.[/b]
[b]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b]
[b][color=#76923c][size=4][u]Credits and Thanks to:
[/u][/size][/color][/b]
[b][color=#ff0000]DarkFox127[/color] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53956/?]Creation Kit Tutorials and Resources[/url][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/53956/?]
[b][color=#ff0000]Caliente[/color] - [/b][/url][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2666/?]Calientes Beautiful Bodies Edition (CBBE)[/url][/b]
[b][color=#ff0000]Gabriel Mailhot[/color] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/13722/?]The Eyes Of Beauty[/url][/b]
[b][color=#ff0000]Apachii[/color] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/10168/?]ApachiiSkyHair[/url] (Creator Has Granted Me Permission To Use His Work)[/b]
[b][color=#ff0000]hyperactivechild[/color] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/21282/?]Modders Resource (More Landscape Textures)[/url] (Creator Has Granted Me Permission To Use His Work)[/b]
[b][color=#ff0000]Maevan2[/color] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/32986/?]Mature skin texture and body for UNP, CBBE, ADEC[/url] (Creator Has Granted Me Permission To Use His Work)[/b]
[b][color=#ff0000]DD AKT[/color] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/7897/?]Envision Face[/url][/b]
[b][color=#ff0000]Alt3rn1ty[/color] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/30181/?]Alt Navetsea UNP Seamless[/url][/b]
[b][color=#ff0000]ECE team[/color] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/12951/?]Enhanced Character Edit[/url][/b]
[b][color=#ff0000]navetsea[/color] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/6554/?]CBBE skin texture V2 V3 plus Thepal and UNP compatible[/url][/b]
[b][color=#ff0000]Chris57 and FavoredSoul[/color] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/2488/?]Better males[/url][/b]
[b][color=#ff0000]Tiwa44[/color] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/47376/?]UNP Minidresses Collection[/url] (Creator Has Granted Everyone Permission To Use His Work)[/b]
[b][color=#ff0000]Petrovich[/color] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/16658/?]UNP Simply Clothes[/url] (Creator Has Granted Everyone Permission To Use His Work)[/b]
[b][color=#ff0000]Tamira and Stroti[/color] - [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33948/?]Strotis Castle Wall Resource for Skyrim[/url][/b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/33948/?]
[b][color=#ff0000]M3rvin[/color] - [/b][/url][b][url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/14894/?]Automatic Light Switch[/url][/b]
[b]---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b]
[b][color=#f1c232][size=4][u]West Riding Retreat - Stand Alone Mod
[/u][/size][/color]
West Riding Retreat, Partially named after the place I grew up in.
This Mods adds a new setllement next to Whiterun.
Consists of a player home, merchants; most of which are followers, NPC homes, craftable enchanted arrows and guards.
[color=#ffffff]All Female characters have UNP based Body.

[/color]Install With NMM or Extract Files in your Data Folder.

My Other Mod:Â [url=http://www.nexusmods.com/skyrim/mods/55679/?]SMR - Revised NPCs[/url]

[color=#9fc5e8][size=3][u]Changes in Version 2.0:
[/u][/size][/color]
1. Had a new idea for the player house interior so I redesigned it.
2. Added Occlusion planes in the exterior boundary walls which has helped with performance on my PC.
3. Settlement Main Gate now uses a pull chain to open and close.
4. Changed Settlement name and names of several characters.
5. Redesigned Npc homes.
6. Added Automatic Light switch to exterior cell, activates at 8pm - 6am.
7. Tweaked Npc dialogues (Using Vanilla Assets only).
8. Added the player home to the spouse marriage dialogue
9. Many small changes ....
10. No loose files packed everything into a bsa file..
11. Reduced the number of npcs wondering in the exterior cell to improve performance.
---------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------------[/b][/center]
author: smriaz

files.name: SMR - West Riding Retreat Extended V2.0
files.fileName: SMR - West Riding Retreat Extended V2.0-54733-2-0.7z
